en: Over the past three years , millions of Americans have struggled to pay rent , utilities , food , and many have been unable to pay their debts .
baseline: 在过去的三年中,数百万美国人 struggled to pay rent, utilities, food, 许多也无法偿还债务。
zh: 在过去三年中,数百万美国人struggletopayrent,utilities,food,andmanyhavebeenunabletopaytheirdebt。

en: On the merits , the states say the Act does n't authorize the Secretary to ever forgive loan principal .
baseline: 关于其优点,州说该法不授权秘书永远宽恕贷款人。

en: That was the decision document that the Secretary signed where he said , I hereby issue waivers and modifications of multiple provisions under Title IV of the student loan program .
baseline: 这是秘书长签署的决定文件,他说:“我 hereby issue waivers and modifications of multiple provisions under Title IV of the student loan program”。

en: We 're talking about half a trillion dollars and 43 million Americans .
baseline: 我们正在谈论半万亿美元和43百万美国人。

en: It 's undisputed and the states are n't contesting that the ordinary meaning of " waive " means to eliminate an obligation in its entirety .
baseline: 无可争辩,各国并不争论“放弃”的一般含义是完全消除一项义务。
zh: 这是无可争辩的,各国并不争论“放弃”的常用含义是完全消除一项义务。

en: It does n't say waive -- modify or waive loan balances .
baseline: 它不说放弃--修改或放弃贷款余额。
